title: Resume
text:
Scientific expirience

2023 Elaboration and defence of the bachelor thesis: Factors affecting pollen transfer effectiveness (ŠVANDA, Petr. Faktory ovlivňující efektivitu přenosu pylu. Bakalářská práce, vedoucí Štenc, Jakub. Praha: Univerzita Karlova, Přírodovědecká fakulta, Katedra botaniky, 2023.)
Ongoing Master thesis: Pollen transfer efficiency as a function of pollen deposition and removal
Ongoing Operating in the PEG scientific team and participating in the experimental parts of the projects
2025 Presentation on Ecoflor conference in León: Preliminary results of master’s thesis on pollen transfer efficiency
2025 Planned internship: Metabarcoding of pollen on pollinator bodies, under Paollo Biella in University of Milano Bicocca
